    • isProperty

      public boolean isProperty​(PropertyMap propertyMap, PropertyName propertyName)
      Check if noun has a certain property active (the property "propertyName")
      Parameters:
      propertyMap - The map of all the active property for each noun
      propertyName - The property we are looking for
      Returns:
      True if noun do have the property, otherwise false

    • checkNounProperties

      public boolean checkNounProperties​(Word prevWord, Board board, java.lang.String direction, java.util.ArrayList<Noun> nounsToRemove) throws java.io.IOException
      Check all noun properties
      Parameters:
      prevWord - The word that wants to go over noun's cell
      board - The level's board
      direction - The direction noun has to go in if it needs to move
      nounsToRemove - List of nouns to remove if we'll be able to move words
      Returns:
      false = noun can't move, therefore prevWord won't be able to move true = we can move/go over noun
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • isStop

      private boolean isStop​(PropertyMap propertyMap)
      Check if noun has property isStop
      Parameters:
      propertyMap - Map with all properties/operators
      Returns:
      true if noun has stop property, otherwise false

    • canBePushed

      private int canBePushed​(Board board, java.lang.String direction, java.util.ArrayList<Noun> nounsToRemove) throws java.io.IOException
      Check if noun can be pushed
      Parameters:
      board - The level's board
      direction - The direction noun has to go if it can be pushed
      nounsToRemove - All nouns to remove if a noun moved
      Returns:
      -1 if noun has push property, but couldn't move 0 if noun doesn't have push property 1 if it has push property, and could be moved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • nounInList

      private boolean nounInList​(java.util.ArrayList<Noun> list, int line, int column)
      Check if a noun with fields equal to "line" and "column" is in list "list"
      Parameters:
      list - The list we are searching in
      line - The line of the noun we are looking for
      column - The column of the noun we are looking for
      Returns:
      True if there's a noun with the same coordinates, otherwise false

    • isPoison

      private void isPoison​(Word prevWord, Board board)
      Check if noun has property poison. If he does, we poison the player, and then have 10 movements left
      Parameters:
      prevWord - The word that wants to go on "this" cell
      board - The level's board

    • isSink

      private void isSink​(Word prevWord, Board board, java.util.ArrayList<Noun> nounsToRemove)
      Check if noun a "SINK" property If it does, add "this" and prevWord to nounsToRemove, since they are going to erase each other
      Parameters:
      prevWord - The word that wants to go on "this" cell
      board - The level's board
      nounsToRemove - List of nouns to remove if we'll be able to move words

    • isHot

      private void isHot​(Word prevWord, PropertyMap propertyMap, java.util.ArrayList<Noun> nounsToRemove)
      Check if noun has property Hot. If he does, if prevWord has Melt property, add it to nounsToRemove
      Parameters:
      prevWord - The word that wants to go on "this" cell
      propertyMap - Map with all properties/operators
      nounsToRemove - List of nouns to remove if we'll be able to move words

    • isMelt

      private void isMelt​(Word prevWord, PropertyMap propertyMap, java.util.ArrayList<Noun> nounsToRemove)
      Check if noun has property Melt. If he does, if prevWord has Hot property, add noun to nousToRemove
      Parameters:
      prevWord - The word that wants to go on "this" cell
      propertyMap - Map with all properties/operators
      nounsToRemove - List of nouns to remove if we'll be able to move words

    • isWin

      private void isWin​(Word prevWord, Board board)
      Check if noun has "WIN" property. If it does, set board field (win) to true
      Parameters:
      prevWord - The word that wants to go on "this" cell
      board - The level's board

    • isDefeat

      private void isDefeat​(Word prevWord, Board board, java.util.ArrayList<Noun> nounsToRemove)
      Check if noun has "DEFEAT" property If it does, add prevWord to nounsToRemove
      Parameters:
      prevWord - The word that wants to go on "this" cell
      board - The level's board
      nounsToRemove - List of nouns to remove if we'll be able to move words
